title: Designing Digital Technology-Integrated Reading Education: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Reading Instruction Methods and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Developing strategies for utilizing digital reading tools applicable in science curricula

learning_goals: One can design and apply three or more effective reading strategies in digital reading environments (BYOD-based)
One can structure an integrated lesson model combining reading comprehension strategies (RCS) and digital literacy (DLRI) within science curriculum contexts
One can analyze learners' digital reading performance using formative assessment tools and establish feedback systems

resources: Digital Content Library for Science Subjects

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
